body: From this [line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/a6f582c48363a6d7f27cbccf50a206070029a6c4/tools/autograd/derivatives.yaml#L74-L78), I guess the name grad won't work. But yes, looking at other functions now, `grad_output` looks to be the common one. Thank You.
